column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////That's the reason why I would like to invite you back as our guest. We'd love the chance to earn a better rating from you. 2 stars is devastating to restaurant
column2: especially coming from an Elite Yelper like yourself. Believe it or not your review carries a lot of weight. We just want the chance to be judge based on more than just 3 appetizers. We've got a great selection of salads
column4: and entrees. I can't forget to mention that we also have a large selection of whiskey and craft cocktails too. Please contact me directly I'd really like to set up your next visit.
